text:
National Association of Broadcasters
1771 N Street, N. W., Washington 6, D. G, Decatur 2-9300
JOHN M. COURIC
MANAGER OF PUBLIC RELATIONS
August 27, 1962
Mr. Elmer G. Sulsser
Director
Radio and Television Communications
Department of Radio and Television
Indiana University
Bloomington, Indiana
Dear Elmer:
Thank you for your letter of August 24*
We are pleased you like the new Speakers' Directory*
Four more copies are enclosed, as you requested, and
I also am sending a copy to Marion Cornell. I hope
she will be able to use it.
Sincerely,
